reviews.review: I find it very much more enjoyable when playing with friends. So if that means I'm only going to play with friends then I will more than likely recommend it so I can play it more with others.
lag, face camp, tunneling, troll, bugs. This game was better 2 years ago.

Es un juego muy bueno, sus mecanicas y la jugabilidad son muy positivas y es bastante adictivo jugarlo con amigos. Es bastante Pay to Win dependiendo el lado en que lo mires, hay un desbalance abrumador de poder entre los asesinos (Que se compran) y supervivientes (En general). Es casi imposible salir todos vivos de la partida si es que el asesino gasto dinero extra en el juego. Cada jugador tiene su estilo para ganar las partidas y puede ser tanto aceptable como asqureroso.

7 / 10
Ist eine reine Zeitverschwendung. Killer schneller als ein Mensch und zu viele Hacken.
Not the easiest, very range inducing but hella fun!
this game is really detailed and very entertaining very recommended to play!! ^^
this is a good costomisable horror game

It's a excellent game that's only really bogged down by the occasional bugs with the release of a new patch and 95% of the player base is incredibly toxic. My advice is to just ignore after-game chat.

game with potential which keeps getting worse everytime the devs touch it... they either go and change something that works fine or introduce new mechanics that no one likes and make the game unplayable.
do the devs only use the ptb to show off? because i don't think they listened to any recommendation from their playerbase (who play on ptb, so devs can change stuff accordingly to their reaction, supposedly). there's A TON of rework needed after that last patch, which literally killed the game.

basically :
- new animations look absolutely AWFUL and unnatural, feels like playing as a robot, or a very old game (people complained for the past month about it).
- somehow chases became insanely harder because of the hitbox, which is weird since someone running around, with their body straight, should not have the same hitbox as a car.
- the new hud is very bland, even though there is more informations about your teammates, and needs to be redone (again, people complained.)

what you could do as a player :
- switch from survivor to killer so you can abuse of those broken game mechanics
- uninstall and play a game whose devs actually listen to their players <3
Think of it as an addiction
10 consumables of 10, worst mechanic in the game.
vERY content game! 5/5 scares the sh1t out of me sometimes:D:DD:

Muy bueno, hay veces que dan ganas de putear pero es nada mas que por problemas de ping.
Pero por lo de mas muy buen juego.

Oft waren die Runden vorher schon frustrierend. Das lag aber an den individuellen Personen, die es gespielt haben und nicht an BHVR/DBD. Jetzt ist es nur noch frustrierend, weil man keine Chance mehr hat. Alle Meta-Perks habt ihr komplett zerst√∂rt. Sinnlos.
Fun game need to learn more.. Just dont give up
The game play is really fun and enjoyable but a good majority of time its waiting for a match or being constantly being booted out when your playing a public match with friends on the Asian servers.
esta bueno el juego como para meterte el dedo

Do not panic. Your heartbeat my be racing. You might see and or hear the killer. Do. Not. Panic. Wait, do not run. We have lost so many to panic. 

Do not unhook your friends if the killer is near. Some killers may camp,in that case tag team the escape effort. 

It can be easy to open the gate and run, but true hero's try to get everyone out of this hell. Be a hero. 

- Some notes found left by survivors 

Overall this game is super fun. Way better with friends as you can talk about things and make plans. I main survivor, but killer can be fun too!
Very fun! All the killers and survivors are so diverse and every killer has their own kind of play style. Overall very fun

Really fun to play, simple and never gets boring

EDIT : Last update fucked up the hitboxes, killers hitting you from a mile away.
EDIT2; Matching is also fucked up.

Muy buen juego, mucha variedad de asesinos y supervivientes, con aun mas variedad de perks y mecanicas. muy recomendable tanto para comprarlo solo o comprarlo con amigos.
Es verdad que el individualismo de la gente arruina un poco la mecanica del survivor, pero en mi opinion esto es mas realista.
Love this game to death!!!! Been playing since 2018 and it just gets better and better. A little buggy at times but makes for some good laughs.

If you like suspense and a thrill, this is a good one. If you like scaring the daylights out of people, also good. Some killers are a lot more difficult than others, but with time and practice it's completely possible to outwit strangers.
Unbalanced and bugged piece of shit
super nice game! really fun to play!
